titleStmt.title: The second humble addresse of those who are called Anabaptists in the county of Lincoln Presented to His Majesty, Charles the Second, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c.
titleStmt.author: Grantham, Thomas, 1634-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Simon Dover, in Martins near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Praying for the redress of their grievances.
The first 'e' on the title page is printed backwards.
Signed by Thomas Grentham (i.e. Grantham) and 29 others.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
